::: {#heading}
Pursuing a PhD in statistics and machine learning since April 2021 in a position shared between 
the [*Leibniz Institute for Prevention Research and Epidemiology - BIPS*](https://www.bips-institut.de) in Bremen 
and the [*Chair of Statistical Learning and Data Science (SLDS)*](https://www.slds.stat.uni-muenchen.de) of LMU Munich 
in association with the [*Munich Center for Machine Learning (MCML)*](https://mcml.ai/).

::: about-links
[{{< ai orcid >}}](https://orcid.org/0000-0001-7528-3795)
[{{< ai google-scholar >}}](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=zcITcLUAAAAJ)

Topics include survival analysis, tree-based methods, and high-dimensional data.
